alert.note: Alert for Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 2:29AM MST until January 11 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Southeast Johnson County. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Roads could become slushy as temperatures rise during the afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall of 3 to 4 inches is possible across the southern end of the county, which includes Linch and I-25 south of milepost 250.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
